name: GSI Technology, Inc.
description: GSI Technology, Inc. is a leading provider of high-performance memory solutions, specializing in advanced memory products and technologies. Founded in 1995 and headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, GSI focuses on developing innovative SRAM (Static Random-Access Memory) products that cater to the rapidly evolving needs of the telecommunications, networking, and computing industries. The company’s flagship product lines include its high-speed SRAM chips, which are utilized in a variety of applications such as data centers, enterprise storage, networking equipment, and telecommunications infrastructure. GSI Technology is committed to delivering superior memory solutions that not only enhance performance and reliability but also drive down power consumption, making their products essential for cutting-edge technology applications. In addition to SRAM, GSI is also exploring opportunities in emerging memory technologies, positioning itself for growth in the competitive semiconductor market. With a strong emphasis on research and development, GSI Technology aims to remain at the forefront of memory technology innovation, ensuring that customers receive the highest quality products to meet their specific needs.

seo.meta_title: GSI Technology, Inc. | High-Performance Memory Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore GSI Technology, Inc., a leader in high-performance memory solutions and SRAM products. Discover our innovative technologies and commitment to excellence in the semiconductor industry.

faq.question: What does GSI Technology specialize in?
faq.answer: GSI Technology specializes in high-performance memory solutions, particularly SRAM products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of GSI Technology?
faq.answer: Lee-Lean Shu is the CEO of GSI Technology, Inc.

faq.question: Where is GSI Technology headquartered?
faq.answer: GSI Technology is headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does GSI Technology offer?
faq.answer: GSI Technology offers SRAM and high-speed memory solutions for various applications.
